title: IL&FS to monetise its stake in DND flyover connecting Delhi to Noida
description: IL&FS plans to sell 26% stake in NTBCL, DND flyover operator, for debt reduction. Public shareholders involved. NTBCL faces financial crunch, demands funds, awaits Supreme Court decision on toll issue.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
